LanguageData.rxExplosiveChunkYield.label: fracturing efficiency
LanguageData.rxExplosiveChunkYield.description: How efficient this explosive is at producing usable chunks when breaking stone.
LanguageData.rxExplosiveMiningYield.label: mining yield
LanguageData.rxExplosiveMiningYield.description: How efficient this explosive is at breaking resource-rich rocks.
LanguageData.rxExplosiveWoodYield.label: wood breaking yield
LanguageData.rxExplosiveWoodYield.description: How efficient this explosive is at producing usable wood from destroyed trees. Explosive forestry is best forestry.
LanguageData.rxPowerCapacity.label: power capacity
LanguageData.rxPowerCapacity.description: The amount of power this battery can store.
LanguageData.rxPowerConsumption.label: power consumption
LanguageData.rxPowerConsumption.description: The amount of power consumed by this building. Produces power when the value is negative.
LanguageData.rxSensorAngle.label: sensor angle
LanguageData.rxSensorAngle.description: The angle in which the sensor can simultaneously detect targets.
LanguageData.rxSensorRange.label: sensor range
LanguageData.rxSensorRange.description: The maximum range at which the sensor is able to detect targets.
LanguageData.rxSensorSpeed.label: sensor rotation speed
LanguageData.rxSensorSpeed.description: How fast the sensor rotates (degrees per second).
LanguageData.rxSignalRange.label: detonator signal range
LanguageData.rxSignalRange.description: The radius in which a detonator is able to detect and detonate remote explosives.
LanguageData.rxSunExposure.label: sun exposure
LanguageData.rxSunExposure.description: The amount of sunlight this solar panel receives. Boosts power production in the morning and evening hours.
LanguageData.rxVentingPower.label: gas venting power
LanguageData.rxVentingPower.description: The amount gas concentration pushed by a vent per second.
